kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=fakestoreapi, url=https://fakestoreapi.com/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

test.name: Test Case: POST Login with Valid Email and Password

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://fakestoreapi.com/auth/login path_url=/auth/login headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '53', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"username": "john@gmail.com", "password": "m38rmF$"}'

POST Response : url=https://fakestoreapi.com/auth/login status=401, reason=Unauthorized headers={'Date': 'Tue, 18 Oct 2022 12:38:01 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'text/html; charset=utf-8', 'Transfer-Encoding': 'chunked', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin': '*', 'X-Powered-By': 'Express', 'CF-Cache-Status': 'DYNAMIC', 'Report-To': '{"endpoints":[{"url":"https:\\/\\/a.nel.cloudflare.com\\/report\\/v3?s=zUylM26o5CoV5PZnNbi0Dv4Xw3nFVumJUajiDD%2FfcTtj1GycpxHejKTeH9rZsv1PxdPG92M73WRdN%2BCM9Fo0e11KLSa3lujtrOFFWmnJB1IeJAWqjLXVIwRaVb19gtvclyXi"}],"group":"cf-nel","max_age":604800}', 'NEL': '{"success_fraction":0,"report_to":"cf-nel","max_age":604800}', 'Server': 'cloudflare', 'CF-RAY': '75c1541f4db351ba-GRU', 'alt-svc': 'h3=":443"; ma=86400, h3-29=":443"; ma=86400'} body=username or password is incorrect
